meta.title: XML and My World
meta.abstract: Turn your world of chaos into a neat and orderly XML document.
meta.author: Abraham Lessthan

chapter.title: Chapter One - Where My Life is a Case Study for Chaos Theory
chapter.p: If you ever wondered about chaos theory then you haven't met me. I am the embodiment of chaos, from my desktop to underneath my car seat.

chapter.title: Chapter Two - Where I Discover the Beauty of XML
chapter.p: One day, as I was walking down the road, with bits of flutter, clutter, and chaos drifting off behind me, I saw a box laying in the middle of the road. Inside was all the neatness and orderliness of XML - everything was arranged and cosy inside those cute little brackets. This was the day that my life changed.
